{% verbatim %}

Module bigquery_storage_v1beta2.client

Parent client for calling the Cloud BigQuery Storage API.

This is the base from which all interactions with the API occur.

Classes

BigQueryReadClient

BigQueryReadClient(*, credentials: Optional[google.auth.credentials.Credentials] = None, transport: Optional[Union[str, google.cloud.bigquery_storage_v1beta2.services.big_query_read.transports.base.BigQueryReadTransport]] = None, client_options: Optional[google.api_core.client_options.ClientOptions] = None, client_info: google.api_core.gapic_v1.client_info.ClientInfo = <google.api_core.gapic_v1.client_info.ClientInfo object>)

Client for interacting with BigQuery Storage API.

The BigQuery storage API can be used to read data stored in BigQuery.
